name: Patient Zero (KO games)
description:
A deadly zombie virus has broken out across the world driving the world into chaos.  The World Health Organization has been unable to find a cure.  The top scientists believe a cure can be found by uncovering the location where the outbreak first started and finding the first affected person--patient zero.  You have tracked down a top secret chemical research facility in the mountains.  It is there that you believe the outbreak first occurred.  Get inside the secret facility.  Find patient zero.  Find the cure.  Survive.

Patient Zero is a first person zombie horror shooter.   There is limited ammo and flashlight light batteries.  The flashlight can't be turned off and drains slowly...so move fast!  It is crucial that you manage your resources.  There is a how to play demo inside the game with all of the controls.  Game requires a keyboard and a mouse with a scroll wheel.

Patient Zero is currently an early idea prototype.  The game was developed by a single person.  With enough support, future levels and enhancements to the game will be added such as better animations, reloading, more zombies, etc.  Any feedback would be greatly appreciated.  Hope you enjoy the game!
